sourcesContent:
pipe works!

Pipe Example

{{msg | uppercase}}

Employee Designation: {{employeeObj.Designation | uppercase}}

Todays date is : {{todaysDate}}

Todays date is : {{todaysDate | date}}

Todays date(short date) is : {{todaysDate | date:'shortDate'}}

Todays date(medium date) is : {{todaysDate | date:'mediumDate'}}

Todays date(dd/MM/yyyy) is : {{todaysDate | date:'dd/MM/yyyy'}}

Todays date(dd-MM-yyyy) is : {{todaysDate | date:'dd-MM-yyyy'}}

employee salary: {{employeeObj.salary | currency}}

employee salary(INR): {{employeeObj.salary | currency:'INR'}}/-

employee salary(Euro): {{employeeObj.salary | currency:'EUR'}}
